name: 'King of the Hill' - 'Luanne's Saga' Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Luanne essentially becomes a regular border in Hank Hill's home during the first season of 'King of the Hill'.  In which room of the house does she sleep?
questions.explanation:
Den.

	Luanne has taken over Hank Hill's den, much to the chagrin of the latter.  She sleeps on a sofa bed, and continues to do so during the future seasons of the series.

questions.text: In this episode, we are officially introduced to Luanne's boyfriend.  What is his name?
questions.explanation:
Buckley.

	Buckley is a motorcycle riding, long-haired type of character.  Dale refers to him as a 'hairball'.  Buckley is an employee at the local Mega-Lo-Mart, and we get a glimpse of him in the pilot episode (though he is unnamed).

questions.text: Which songwriter/flugelhorn player does a commercial for Mega Lo Mart during the episode 'Luanne's Saga'?
questions.explanation:
Chuck Mangione.

	Chuck Mangione is a semi-regular on the series 'King of the Hill' as celebrity sponsor for Mega Lo Mart, the 'King of the Hill' version of Walmart.  For this episode, Chuck Mangione created a special musical score.

questions.text: After Luanne is jilted by her boyfriend, Hank and Peggy are forced to deal with their heart-broken niece.  Peggy gives Hank some advice on how to deal with Luanne.  Which three-word phrase does she suggest Hank use to mollify Luanne's feelings?
questions.explanation:
You look pretty.

	Peggy's suggestion doesn't really work on Luanne, she ignores Hank when he says that she looks pretty.  However, Hank is later able to use the phrase to appease his wife.

questions.text: During Luanne's healing time, she and Hank Hill share a few laughs and which tasty treat in the kitchen?
questions.explanation:
Raw cookie dough.

	It is at this moment that Hank Hill learns of an exciting new concoction, cookie dough ice cream.

questions.text: The Hills and their friends from the neighborhood enjoy an evening together at a local country dancing joint.  Boomhauer is requested to dance with a lovely lady, and he assigns his luck to the cologne he is wearing.  Which brand of cologne does he claim to wear?
questions.explanation:
Calvin Klein.

	Specifically, Boomhauer claims it's the 'CK One' he wears.  He suggests that his cologne is like 'catnip' for women.

questions.text: At the dancing hall, Hank Hill notices a young man named Wade that he believes will be perfect for Luanne.  The first thing Hank notices about Wade is his shiny belt buckle.  What shape does Wade's belt buckle take?
questions.explanation:
The state of Texas.

	Wade not only wears a belt buckle in the shape of Texas, but he also has a shirt on with the colors of the American flag.  Further endearing him to Hank, Wade claims to be a quarterback and to only used propane for his cooking needs. Hank also wears a Texas-themed belt buckle, his buckle emblazoned with the word 'Texas'.

questions.text: Though Hank believes he has successfully matched Luanne with Wade, Luanne arrives home later on in another man's car.  Whose car is this?
questions.explanation:
Boomhauer.

	Boomhauer's CK One cologne apparently has an attraction that is well beyond his control.  Boomhauer returns Luanne to the Hill house, but there is no overt suggestion that he is actually 'dating' the Hill's niece.  However, Hank jumps to conclusions and provokes Luanne to insist that she will stay over and Boomhauer's for the evening, much to the latter's chagrin.

questions.text: Dale Gribble, seeing all of the strange events afoot in his neighborhood, suggests that his block is becoming very much like which television show?
questions.explanation:
Melrose Place.

	Mr. Gribble has a fantastic imagination.  Of course, unbeknownst to the poor chap, right as he makes this suggestion, John Redcorn comes crawling out of his bedroom window.

questions.text: Later in the episode, most of the cast dines in a local eatery called Luly's Cafetaria.  Among the many wonderful features of this fine dining locale, they have 8 different varieties of which condiment?
questions.explanation:
Ketchup.

	8 varieties of ketchup *and* 3 varities of catsup.  They also have a fork bar, with interestingly shaped forks from around the world.  Hank Hill orders two kinds of gravy at Luly's Cafetaria, one bowl of white gravy and another bowl of brown gravy. Thank you for playing this quiz, I hope you have enjoyed it.
